name: Roasted Roma Tomatoes and Garlic
author: Ali
summary: I make this recipe as a side dish for homemade macaroni and cheese and Italian pasta dishes. The leftovers work great chopped up and thrown into spaghetti sauce!
ingredients: ¼ cup chopped fresh basil leaves
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Place the tomato halves in a shallow baking dish in which they can all fit in snugly side by side
Insert the whole cloves of garlic in between the tomatoes
Brush olive oil over the top and sprinkle with basil
Bake uncovered for 35 to 45 minutes, until tomatoes have softened and are sizzling in the pan with the edges slightly charred
